title: ‘Yellowstone’ Episode 6 Recap
description:
Chris Ryan and Ryen Russillo saddle up once again to talk about Episode 6 of the Paramount+ drama ‘Yellowstone,’ including the potential merits of ass-kickings in the workplace, the outright disrespect shown to breakfast in this episode, and much more.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Ryen Rusillo
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
